author: Benoît `BoD` Lubek
comment: But let's face it, it was complicated/cumbersome/obscure/not user friendly. Now that I have found this app, my life is simple (AND efficient) again :)  Hurray!
title: I used to use Tasker for this.

author: Guy Phillips
comment: Where the wear app fails.. this app comes to the rescue. Thank you!
title: Awesome!

author: Martin Gilbert
comment: Does exactly what it says it does, simple and effective, what more do you want! Works on both moto 360 2nd gen and g watch r.
title: Works as it should

author: Dinico Win
comment: Please implement a schedule feature. Time and day.
title: Schedule

author: Brock Murley
comment: After numerous resyncs and enables it still doesn't show on my watch. Please fix.
title: Won't show up on my LG G.

author: Will Johnson
comment: Great and useful app. I keep my phone silent when I'm wearing my G Watch. Now I don't have to think about resetting the sound when my watch is charging. It is on my short list of must have apps. Great work.
title: Must have app for Wear

author: Karl Gingerich
comment: Right on, why have the phone going off if your wrist is buzzing?!  This could make phones so much more polite in public! :vP
title: Excellent Idea!

author: Axel H
comment: It might be able to disconnect the watch when it is charging I don't know. What it can't do is to relice that the watch is still in the charger even if it is fully charged and the vibration allert on disconnect / reconnect is imposible to disable even thou it have an option that is suposed to do just that.
title: Don't work.
